Field.DataDec: 用户头像，最后一个数值代表正方形头像大小（有0、46、64、96、132数值可选，0代表640*640正方形头像），用户没有头像时该项为空。若用户更换头像，原有头像URL将失效。:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的性别，值为1时是男性，值为2时是女性，值为0时是未知:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的标识，对当前公众号唯一:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的性别，值为1时是男性，值为2时是女性，值为0时是未知:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的标识，对当前公众号唯一:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户是否订阅该公众号标识，值为0时，代表此用户没有关注该公众号，拉取不到其余信息。:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的性别，值为1时是男性，值为2时是女性，值为0时是未知:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户头像，最后一个数值代表正方形头像大小（有0、46、64、96、132数值可选，0代表640*640正方形头像），用户没有头像时该项为空。若用户更换头像，原有头像URL将失效。:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户关注时间，为时间戳。如果用户曾多次关注，则取最后关注时间:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
只有在用户将公众号绑定到微信开放平台帐号后，才会出现该字段。:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
错误时微信会返回错误码等信息:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
错误时微信会返回错误码等信息:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]

Table.TableDec: 学生测验关联表-学生答题表

Field.DataDec: 课程视频id，多个视频,风格
选项字符串-用竖线分隔符

View.Sql: CREATE VIEW del_VTimuDaXue AS SELECT dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.AutoId, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.Id, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.answer, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.chapterId, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.difficulty, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.explain, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.label, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.mediaHeight, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.mediaType, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.mediaWidth, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.optionA, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.optionB, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.optionC, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.optionD, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.optionE, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.optionF, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.optionG, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.optionH, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.optionType, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.question, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.questionId, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.mediaContent, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.falseCount, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.trueCount, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.wrongRate, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.sourceFile, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.sourceid, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.sourceZhangjie, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.optionnum, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.kemu, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.url, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.sc, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.area, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.diggUp, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.diggDown, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.IsRepeatTf, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.ExamType, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.Analysis, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.LinkExam, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.OrderId, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.Teacher, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.Knowledge, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.YearId, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.PaperShortName, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.kemuId, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.OptionStr, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.AnswerABC, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.KaoDian, dbo.st_kemuInfo.kemuName, dbo.st_kemuInfo.ZsId, dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.user_id FROM dbo.St_TTimuDaXue RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.st_kemuInfo ON dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.kemuId = dbo.st_kemuInfo.kemuId
CREATE VIEW del_VTimuDaXueErrorInfo AS SELECT errorSum, answerSum, openId FROM dbo.St_TTimuDaXueErrorInfo

CREATE VIEW del1_VTimuDaXue AS SELECT dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.*, dbo.st_kemuInfo.kemuName, dbo.st_kemuInfo.ZsId FROM dbo.st_kemuInfo RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.St_TTimuDaXue ON dbo.st_kemuInfo.kemuId = dbo.St_TTimuDaXue.kemuId

CREATE PROCEDURE sp_getJSONFields @Json VARCHAR(MAX) AS BEGIN SELECT @Json=REPLACE(@Json,'{','') SELECT @Json=REPLACE(@Json,'}',',') DECLARE @temp VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @objName VARCHAR(30) DECLARE @objValue VARCHAR(30) DECLARE @fieldSql VARCHAR(MAX) SET @fieldSql='select '
WHILE LEN(@Json)>0 BEGIN SELECT @temp=SUBSTRING(@Json,0,CHARINDEX(',',@Json,0)) --PRINT @temp SELECT @Json=RIGHT(@Json,LEN(@Json)-LEN(@temp)-1) --PRINT @Json
set @objName =left(@temp,CHARINDEX(':',@temp,0)-1) set @objValue =right(@temp,len(@temp)-CHARINDEX(':',@temp,0))
--PRINT @objName+'='+ @objValue+';' set @fieldSql=@fieldSql+REPLACE(@objValue,'"','''')+' as '+REPLACE(@objName,'"','')+','
--PRINT '------------------' END SET @fieldSql=LEFT(@fieldSql,LEN(@fieldSql)-1)
--EXEC sp_executesql @fieldSql EXEC (@fieldSql) END

CREATE VIEW v_Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications AS SELECT Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_1.classificationName AS pname1, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.classificationName AS pname2, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.Id, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.Uuid, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.CreateTime, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.classificationEnum, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.classificationId, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.classificationName, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.partJobCount, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.parentId, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.ModifyTime, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.user_id, Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.Id AS root FROM dbo.Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications AS Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2 RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications AS Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_1 ON Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.parentId = Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_1.classificationId RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications ON Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_1.parentId = dbo.Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications.classificationId WHERE (Jz_childrenPartJobClassifications_2.parentId = 0)

CREATE VIEW v_jz_userApplyManages AS SELECT dbo.Jz_userApplyManages.status, dbo.Jz_userApplyManages.secondStatus, dbo.Jz_userApplyManages.user_id, dbo.Jz_partJobs.partJobId, dbo.Jz_partJobs.addressDetail, dbo.Jz_partJobs.jobTimeStandard, dbo.Jz_partJobs.partJobLogo, dbo.Jz_partJobs.partJobTitle, dbo.Jz_partJobs.salary, dbo.Jz_company.companyName, dbo.Jz_company.companyType, dbo.Jz_company.email, dbo.Jz_company.companyId, dbo.Jz_company.companyUuid, dbo.Jz_company.companyMobile, dbo.Jz_company.companyAccountId, dbo.Jz_partJobs.addressBuilding, dbo.Jz_userApplyManages.businessType, dbo.Jz_userApplyManages.partJobApplyId FROM dbo.Jz_company RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Jz_partJobs ON dbo.Jz_company.companyUuid = dbo.Jz_partJobs.companyUuid RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Jz_userApplyManages ON dbo.Jz_partJobs.partJobUuid = dbo.Jz_userApplyManages.partJobUuid

CREATE VIEW v_xt_course AS SELECT dbo.xt_teacher.name AS teacher_name, dbo.xt_course.name, dbo.xt_course.active, dbo.xt_course.major, dbo.xt_course.course_code, dbo.xt_course.courser_caption, dbo.xt_course.courser_content, dbo.xt_course.category, dbo.xt_course.weight_config, dbo.xt_course.Uuid, dbo.xt_course.teacher_id, dbo.xt_course.ModifyTime, dbo.xt_course.add_method, dbo.xt_course.CreateTime, dbo.xt_course.member_num, dbo.xt_course.course_time FROM dbo.xt_teacher INNER JOIN dbo.xt_course ON dbo.xt_teacher.Uuid = dbo.xt_course.teacher_id

CREATE VIEW v_xt_courseTask AS SELECT dbo.xt_task.title, dbo.xt_task.create_time, dbo.xt_task.endtime, dbo.xt_task.cover, dbo.xt_course_task.task_id, dbo.xt_course_task.Correcting_finish, dbo.xt_course_task.Correcting_unfinish, dbo.xt_course_task.submit_unfinsh, dbo.xt_course_task.creatime, dbo.xt_course_task.course_id FROM dbo.xt_task INNER JOIN dbo.xt_course_task ON dbo.xt_task.uuid = dbo.xt_course_task.task_id

CREATE VIEW v_xt_courseVideo AS SELECT dbo.xt_course_video.course_id, dbo.xt_course_video.name, dbo.xt_course_video.url, dbo.xt_course_video.[level], dbo.xt_course_video.CreateTime, dbo.xt_course_video.duration, dbo.xt_course_video.category, dbo.xt_course_video.uuid FROM dbo.xt_course_video INNER JOIN dbo.xt_course ON dbo.xt_course_video.course_id = dbo.xt_course.Uuid

CREATE VIEW v_xt_student_task AS SELECT xt_student_task_1.taskfile, xt_student_task_1.student_id, xt_student_task_1.submit, xt_student_task_1.task_result, xt_student_task_1.approval, xt_student_task_1.approval_people, xt_student_task_1.approval_time, dbo.xt_student_task_result.submit_time, dbo.xt_student_task_result.mark, dbo.xt_student_task_result.grade, xt_student_task_1.task_id FROM dbo.xt_student_task AS xt_student_task_1 INNER JOIN dbo.xt_student_task_result ON xt_student_task_1.task_id = dbo.xt_student_task_result.task_id

CREATE VIEW Vkemu AS SELECT dbo.st_kemuInfo.id, dbo.st_kemuInfo.kemuId, dbo.st_kemuInfo.kemuName, dbo.st_kemuInfo.pId, dbo.st_kemuInfo.ZsId, dbo.st_kemuInfo.IsShowIndex, dbo.st_kemuInfo.Icon, dbo.st_kemuInfo.sc, dbo.st_kemuInfo.scType, dbo.st_kemuInfo.kemuType, dbo.st_kemuInfo.shortKemuName, dbo.st_kemuInfo.timuSum, dbo.st_kemuInfo.question_sum, dbo.st_kemuInfo.question_sumMore, dbo.st_kemuInfo.CreateTime, dbo.st_kemuInfo.sc1, dbo.st_kemuInfo.sc2, dbo.st_kemuInfo.sc3, dbo.st_kemuInfo.seq, dbo.st_kemuInfo.isHot, dbo.st_TzsInfo.zsName, dbo.st_TzsInfo.zsTypeName, dbo.st_TzsInfo.ZsTypeId FROM dbo.st_kemuInfo LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.st_TzsInfo ON dbo.st_kemuInfo.ZsId = dbo.st_TzsInfo.zsId

CREATE VIEW VSchool AS SELECT dbo.TscWxInfo.sc_id, dbo.TscWxInfo.sc_name, dbo.TSchool.Name, dbo.TSchool.Id, dbo.TSchool.IsHot, dbo.TSchool.City, dbo.TSchool.Province, dbo.TSchool.X, dbo.TSchool.Y, dbo.TSchool.Seq, dbo.TSchool.Address, dbo.TSchool.Intro, dbo.TSchool.Tel, dbo.TSchool.SchoolUrl, dbo.TSchool.Is985 FROM dbo.TSchool LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.TscWxInfo ON dbo.TSchool.Id = dbo.TscWxInfo.School_id

CREATE VIEW VUserInfo AS SELECT dbo.TUserInfo.ID, dbo.TUserInfo.user_id, dbo.TUserInfo.nick_name, dbo.TUserInfo.headimgurl, dbo.TUserInfo.phone_number, dbo.TUserInfo.PassWord, dbo.TUserInfo.real_name, dbo.TUserInfo.user_name, dbo.TUserInfo.DeviceId, dbo.TUserInfo.gender, dbo.TUserInfo.city, dbo.TUserInfo.province, dbo.TUserInfo.qq, dbo.TUserInfo.change, dbo.TUserInfo.wechat_app_openid, dbo.TUserInfo.token, dbo.TUserInfo.point, dbo.TUserInfo.wechat_openid, dbo.TUserInfo.weibo, dbo.TUserInfo.province_id, dbo.TUserInfo.city_id, dbo.TUserInfo.show_name, dbo.TUserInfo.school_id, dbo.TUserInfo.department_id, dbo.TUserInfo.latitude, dbo.TUserInfo.longitude, dbo.TUserInfo.school_name, dbo.TUserInfo.department_name, dbo.TUserInfo.grade, dbo.TUserInfo.email, dbo.TUserInfo.user_type, dbo.TUserInfo.ref_id, dbo.TUserInfo.sc_id, dbo.TSchool.Name AS School_name2, dbo.TDepartment.Name AS Department_name2 FROM dbo.TscWxInfo RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.TSchool ON dbo.TscWxInfo.School_id = dbo.TSchool.Id RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.TUserInfo ON dbo.TSchool.Id = dbo.TUserInfo.school_id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.TDepartment ON dbo.TUserInfo.department_id = dbo.TDepartment.Id

CREATE VIEW VzsInfo AS SELECT dbo.st_TzsTypeInfo.typeName, dbo.st_TzsInfo.Id, dbo.st_TzsInfo.zsName FROM dbo.st_TzsInfo LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.st_TzsTypeInfo ON dbo.st_TzsInfo.ZsTypeId = dbo.st_TzsTypeInfo.Id

CREATE VIEW xt_classIndex AS SELECT dbo.xt_teacher.name AS teacher_name, dbo.xt_course.name, dbo.xt_course.active, dbo.xt_course.major, dbo.xt_course.course_code, dbo.xt_course.courser_caption, dbo.xt_course.courser_content, dbo.xt_course.category, dbo.xt_course.weight_config, dbo.xt_course.Uuid, dbo.xt_teacher.Uuid AS Expr2, dbo.xt_course.teacher_id FROM dbo.xt_teacher INNER JOIN dbo.xt_course ON dbo.xt_teacher.Uuid = dbo.xt_course.teacher_id

CREATE VIEW xt_course_list AS SELECT dbo.xt_teacher.Uuid, dbo.xt_course.Uuid AS Expr1, dbo.xt_course.name, dbo.xt_course.major, dbo.xt_course.is_delete, dbo.xt_course.teacher_id, dbo.xt_course.course_code, dbo.xt_course.courser_caption, dbo.xt_course.courser_content, dbo.xt_course.category, dbo.xt_student_course.id, dbo.xt_student_course.course_id, dbo.xt_student_course.student_id FROM dbo.xt_teacher INNER JOIN dbo.xt_course ON dbo.xt_teacher.Uuid = dbo.xt_course.Uuid CROSS JOIN dbo.xt_student_course
